Text: I am confident in you from shareholderDear Mr Lay My name is Djoefree Hermanto and I am one of Enron shareholders I just like to mention that I really have full confident in you Even though the current Enron situation financially impacts my family but I fully believe any decision that you will make is definitely the best for everyone of us Ill support you and your team with prayers Thank you Sincerely D Hermanto Do You Yahoo Buy the perfect holiday gifts at Yahoo Shopping

Happy New YearDear Mr Lay My name is Djoefree Hermanto one of Enron shareholders I would like to wish you your family Enron team Happy New Year I wish you all the best in the coming year Sincerely D Hermanto Do You Yahoo Send your FREE holiday greetings online
